document.full_text: an outspoken incumbent looked certain to win a fourth term as tokyo governor despite a gaffe in which he said a deadly earthquake and tsunami in japan's northeast last month was "divine punishment," media exit polls showed on sunday.
document.title: japanese voters may further weaken pm over nuclear crisis
lines_and_colors: an outspoken incumbent looked certain to win a fourth term as tokyo governor despite a gaffe in which he said a deadly earthquake and tsunami in japan's northeast last month was "divine punishment," media exit polls showed on sunday.
